name: PUBLIC HEALTH RESOURCE SOCIETY
briefDescription: Public Health Resource Society (PHRS) is a national level organization with a regional presence in eastern India. PHRS supports a voluntary network of many hundred concerned public health practitioners who are willing to intervene towards ‘Health for All’ by creating capacities and engaging with the public health system. Currently, the major areas of works of PHRS are capacity building, model building, advocacy, research, publication and networking. PHRS has been awarded the Certification of Accreditation by the Credibility Alliance under the desirable norms prescribed for good governance of voluntary organizations.
